intro: This document serves as a comprehensive product user manual for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) Urban Atlas, focusing on the 2012-2018 update and extension. It provides detailed mapping guidelines and class descriptions to support service providers in generating standardised land use and land cover (LU/LC) maps across Functional Urban Areas (FUAs) in Europe, the UK, and Turkey. The manual outlines specifications for the core LU/LC database, the Street Tree Layer (STL), and the Digital Height Model (DHM), ensuring congruent product attributes, common nomenclature, and comparable product quality.
